headline: Viatris to Pay $335 Million for Settlement of Opioid-Related Claims
summary: VTRS has reached an agreement of $335 million to resolve opioid-related claims by states, local governments, and tribes against it and certain of its subsidiaries.

raw.headline: Viatris to Pay $335 Million for Settlement of Opioid-Related Claims
raw.summary: VTRS has reached an agreement of $335 million to resolve opioid-related claims by states, local governments, and tribes against it and certain of its subsidiaries.
